Keyterm: I - Model KF, 2 PCLM, Approved June 28, 1938.

Info:
Maximum, except takeoff 
 -- in. Hg., 2300 rpm (50 hp) 
 Takeoff (one minute) 
 -- in. Hg., 2300 rpm (50 hp)

Level flight or climb - 100 mph True Ind. 
 Glide or dive -- 135 mph True Ind.
KF-1 and up manufactured prior to 12-11-42 eligible. Approval expired as of that date.

Keyterm:
II - Model 50-F, 2 PCLM, Approved October 3, 1938. 
 (Same as model KF except for wider cabin. No structural changes.)

Info:
Maximum, except takeoff 
 -- in. Hg., 2300 rpm (50 hp) 
 Takeoff (one minute) 
 -- in. Hg., 2300 rpm (50 hp)

Level flight or climb - 100 mph True Ind. 
 Glide or dive -- 135 mph True Ind.
F-1018 and up manufactured prior to 12-11-42 eligible. Approval expired as of that date.
